## Chess.inStalemate() method

Returns true or false if the side to move has been stalemated.

```js
const chess = new Chess('4k3/4P3/4K3/8/8/8/8/8 b - - 0 78')
chess.inStalemate()
// -> true

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
inStalemate(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
